# sotoon_iam_role (Resource)

Manages an IAM role within a Sotoon workspace.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the role.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The UUID of the role.
